description: Provide secure, permission-controlled access to Firebase Firestore databases through a standardized MCP interface. Enable AI assistants and other clients to perform full CRUD operations, advanced queries, batch operations, and transactional updates with granular collection and operation-level permissions. Ensure data consistency and security with default deny rules and fine-grained access control.

capabilities.name: firestore-list-collections
capabilities.description: List Firestore collections

capabilities.name: firestore-get-collection
capabilities.description: Get documents from a Firestore collection

capabilities.name: firestore-get-document
capabilities.description: Get a document from Firestore

capabilities.name: firestore-create-document
capabilities.description: Create a new document in Firestore

capabilities.name: firestore-update-document
capabilities.description: Update an existing Firestore document

capabilities.name: firestore-delete-document
capabilities.description: Delete a document from Firestore

capabilities.name: firestore-query-collection
capabilities.description: Query documents in a Firestore collection

capabilities.name: firestore-list-subcollections
capabilities.description: List subcollections of a document

capabilities.name: firestore-get-collection-by-path
capabilities.description: Get documents from a collection using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-get-document-by-path
capabilities.description: Get a document using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-create-document-by-path
capabilities.description: Create a document in a collection using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-update-document-by-path
capabilities.description: Update a document using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-delete-document-by-path
capabilities.description: Delete a document using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-query-collection-by-path
capabilities.description: Query documents in a collection using full path (supports subcollections)

capabilities.name: firestore-batch-write
capabilities.description: Execute multiple write operations in a single atomic batch

capabilities.name: firestore-batch-read
capabilities.description: Read multiple documents in a single operation

capabilities.name: firestore-transaction
capabilities.description: Execute a transaction with read and write operations

capabilities.name: firestore-increment-field
capabilities.description: Atomically increment a numeric field value

capabilities.name: firestore-array-union
capabilities.description: Add elements to an array field without duplicates

capabilities.name: firestore-array-remove
capabilities.description: Remove elements from an array field

capabilities.name: firestore-server-timestamp
capabilities.description: Set a field to the server timestamp

capabilities.name: firestore-delete-field
capabilities.description: Delete specific fields from a document

capabilities.name: firestore-field-value-batch
capabilities.description: Execute multiple field value operations in a batch
